name: BlackOut Operation LEGO
description:
Hide among the workers to avoid being detected by the robots and manage to destroy the A.I.

Controls:

WASD: To move

SPACE: To jump

F: Interact

1: PC animation

2: Dance animation

3: Miners animation

4: GYM animation

WIN/LOSE Condition:

Win: Shut down the generators to kill the A.I. final

Lose: Getting caught by the guards

GOD MODE:

Activate with the “O”;

Deactivate with the “L”
